search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Salesmate (salesmate.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Salesmate can be found at: [https://www.salesmate.io/crm-pricing/](https://www.salesmate.io/crm-pricing/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: CRM Pricing Plans | Affordable CRM with Powerful Features - Salesmate

extracted_content.content:
CRM Pricing Plans | Affordable CRM with Powerful Features
===============
                

[![Image 1: Salesmate Logo](https://www.salesmate.io/mm-images/salesmate-logo-e89j70yf.svg)![Image 2: salesmate logo](https://www.salesmate.io/mm-images/salesmate-logo-white-bddrfqg5.svg)](https://www.salesmate.io/ "Header Logo")

[Try for Free](https://accounts.salesmate.io/registration-step1.html?convertedFromPage=pricing&utm_source=capterra&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=listicle&utm_term=capterra_small_buss.&utm_content=pricing&___i_s_S_S_R___=1)

Simple pricing for businesses of all sizes
==========================================

Find a perfect plan to boost sales, automate marketing, and support your customers with the AI-powered CRM

Billed Monthly

Billed Annually

Save Up to 20%

Basic
-----

Designed for startups and SMBs needing effective pipeline management across channels.

**$ 23**per user / month

[Try for Free](https://accounts.salesmate.io/registration-step1.html?analyticsLabel=Simple_pricing_for_businesses_of_all_sizes&convertedFromPage=pricing&utm_source=capterra&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=listicle&utm_term=capterra_small_buss.&utm_content=pricing&___i_s_S_S_R___=1)

**Key features**

*   Contact, Company management
*   Activity management and Calendar sync
*   Deal Pipeline management
*   Full email sync with Templates and Tracking
*   Meeting Scheduler
*   Standard Dashboard and Reports
*   Web forms
*   Custom fields

**Sales and Marketing Automation (Smart Flows)**

*   20K Credits / User / Month

[Compare](https://www.salesmate.io/compare/)

Pro
---

Most Popular

Perfect for growing and mid-sized businesses looking for enhanced capabilities.

**$ 39**per user / month

[Try for Free](https://accounts.salesmate.io/registration-step1.html?analyticsLabel=Simple_pricing_for_businesses_of_all_sizes&convertedFromPage=pricing&utm_source=capterra&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=listicle&utm_term=capterra_small_buss.&utm_content=pricing&___i_s_S_S_R___=1)

**Everything in Basic, plus…**

*   Sequences
*   Quotes management
*   Product management
*   Ticket management
*   Team Inbox
*   Team management
*   Custom Dashboard and Reports with Goals
*   Field-based permissions
*   Formula fields
*   Sandy AI

**Sales and Marketing Automation (Smart Flows)**

*   30K Credits / User / Month

[Compare](https://www.salesmate.io/compare/)

Business
--------

All-in-one features to align your sales, marketing, and support teams for seamless growth

**$ 63**per user / month

[Try for Free](https://accounts.salesmate.io/registration-step1.html?analyticsLabel=Simple_pricing_for_businesses_of_all_sizes&convertedFromPage=pricing&utm_source=capterra&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=listicle&utm_term=capterra_small_buss.&utm_content=pricing&___i_s_S_S_R___=1)

**Everything in Pro, plus...**

*   Deal credit split
*   Custom Duplicate management rules
*   Service Level Agreements
*   Advanced Goal management
*   Calculated Fields
*   Power Dialer
*   Voicemail Drop
*   SSO

**Sales and Marketing Automation (Smart Flows)**

*   40K Credits / User / Month

[Compare](https://www.salesmate.io/compare/)

Enterprise
----------

Customizable solutions with enterprise-grade tools and support for scaling at the highest level

**$ Custom**per user / month

[Talk to Expert](https://www.salesmate.io/pricing/#showNewMessage)

**Everything in Business, plus…**

*   Audit logs
*   Dedicated onboarding consultation
*   Custom validation rules (upcoming)
*   Dedicated Account Manager
*   IP restriction
*   Quarterly business review
*   Dedicated IP (1 dedicated IP included in the plan)
*   24 X 7 support

[Compare](https://www.salesmate.io/compare/)

Enterprise
----------

Customizable solutions with enterprise-grade tools and support for scaling at the highest level

### Everything in Business, plus…

*   Audit logs
*   Dedicated onboarding consultation
*   Custom validation rules
*   Dedicated Account Manager
*   IP restriction
*   Quarterly business review
*   Dedicated IP (1 dedicated IP included in the plan)
*   24 X 7 support

Note: The enterprise onboarding packages start from **$1999**

[Talk to Expert](https://www.salesmate.io/pricing/#)  

All in one app integrations at no extra cost!
---------------------------------------------

### Seamlessly integrate your apps

*   ![Image 6: Gsuite](https://www.salesmate.io/mm-images/google-pprboil7.svg) Gsuite

[Explore all integration](https://www.salesmate.io/integrations/)  

### Included with every plan

*   ![Image 15: iPhone, iPad, and Andriod mobile apps](https://www.salesmate.io/mm-images/mobile-ipad-mgf1w1kj.svg) iPhone, iPad, and Andriod mobile apps
*   ![Image 16: 24 X 5 live chat and email support](https://www.salesmate.io/mm-images/24-hours-support-lrqg1qdb.svg) 24 X 5 live chat and email support
*   ![Image 17: Chrome Plugin](https://www.salesmate.io/mm-images/chrome-plugin-3s4xzrru.svg) Chrome Plugin
*   ![Image 18: Access to publicity available RESTful APIs](https://www.salesmate.io/mm-images/access-to-publish-avzgx4pr.svg) Access to publicly available RESTful APIs 
*   ![Image 19: Support docs, training videos and community access](https://www.salesmate.io/mm-images/chrome-plugin-3s4xzrru.svg) Support docs, training videos and community access

Achieve more with these powerful add-ons
----------------------------------------

Boost sales and streamline your workflow with tools and features designed to do more.

### Calling and Texting credits

Use Salesmate’s built-in calling and texting features to stay connected effortlessly. Make and receive calls, power-dial contacts, send bulk SMS, and transcribe conversations—all from a single platform.

[Learn More](https://www.salesmate.io/pricing/#popup)

### Conversation Inbox

Manage all your customer conversations in one place with Salesmate’s conversation inbox. From live chat to social media messaging, streamline engagement across platforms for a cohesive customer experience.

[Learn More](https://www.salesmate.io/pricing/#popup)

### Extra Smart Flow credits

Need more smart flow execution credits? With extra Smart Flow credits, scale your workflow automations and automate your end-to-end sales and marketing playbooks.

[Learn More](https://www.salesmate.io/pricing/#popup)

### Dedicated IP address

Ensure secure and reliable email marketing with a Dedicated IP address exclusively assigned to your business. Protect your sender reputation and maintain consistent deliverability for high-volume email campaigns.

[Learn More](https://www.salesmate.io/pricing/#popup)

Trusted by **8,500+** businesses globally

Top rated across all platforms

Customers have rated us the best compared to any other software across review platforms like G2, Gartner, TrustRadius.

[Try it yourself](https://accounts.salesmate.io/registration-step1.html?analyticsLabel=Top_rated_across_all_platforms&convertedFromPage=pricing&utm_source=capterra&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=listicle&utm_term=capterra_small_buss.&utm_content=pricing&___i_s_S_S_R___=1 "Try it yourself")

Frequently asked questions

Got questions? Find answers!
----------------------------

### How does the 15-day free trial work?

It’s simple. You’ll create a Salesmate account and add as many users as you’d like. You’ll have unlimited access to all Salesmate features. After 15 days, you could pick a monthly or annual billing plan.

### Can I test with my teammates during the trial?

You can invite your teammates to join your Salesmate trial account. In fact, this is the best way to make the most out of your trial. Just click on the “invite teammates” on the getting started steps.

### What if we need little more time than 15 days to evaluate Salesmate?

If you haven’t purchased Salesmate before the trial ends, and you need a little more time to complete your evaluation, just let us know. We’re happy to extend to your trial.

### How does the built-in phone / sms pricing work?

Make and receive calls/texts in Salesmate by purchasing local and toll-free numbers starting at $1.1/month. Once you enable the calling feature, you can always top up your credits. Check calling rates / SMS rates.

### Do you offer refunds?

The applicable Fee is charged in advance on monthly or annual payment intervals. All Fees are non-refundable (user subscription, voice credits, etc.), i.e. there are no refunds or credits for periods where the Client did not use an activated Account, used it only partially, or deactivated the Account or terminated these Terms during an ongoing payment interval. If, after signing up, Client elects to upgrade to a more expensive Plan, the unused portion of any prepaid Fees shall be applied to the Fee of the more expensive Plan.

### What type of payment methods do you accept?

We accept Visa, MasterCard, Discover, and American Express. For annual payments, we can issue invoices and accept POs. A credit card is our preferred mode of payment. We also accept bank transfers only for annual subscriptions exceeding USD 500. Any or all fees, charges, taxes towards such transactions to be borne by the purchaser. Contact [sales@salesmate.io](mailto:sales@salesmate.io)  to find out more.

Say hello to your new CRM

Take a risk-free trial and explore all capabilities at zero cost for 15 days.
